title: Abbott and Costello universal collection
text: This was probably my favorite prime day purchase and was a fantastic deal.  My daughter (39 years) is so excited to watch these and share with my grandsons these movies of her childhood.  They were old then, old when I watched me as a child too!  But funny is funny.  It's an era of comedy that has passed and is being rediscovered and appreciated again.  We gave up buying DVD's a long time ago and just stream purchases any more - but this set was worthy of the purchase.  Whole Family friendly and worth the price when not on sale!

title: The intern
text: Rather an oldie - but a cute, satisfying story and Robert DeNero.  I liked it, my husband loved it.  We purchased this via stream service (wifi) - no DVD to store, download your purchase to about any device and play when and where you want.

title: Funny Farm
text: Great Chevy Chase classic.  I have a postman that actually acts like the one in this movie so it's hilarious to me.  Worthy of watch.  The oldies are the best

title: Monsters inc
text: Oh please.  Who doesn't love Boo and kitty and Mike Wazowski??  You'll recognize the voices and the story is very sweet and of course, with Disney - there is a life lesson.  Great colors and animation - a really fun movie that my 8 year old grandson loved when he was really little and still does.  We purchase all our movies via stream any more.  No DVD to store and access on about any device and any time for download or stream.  So, we are collecting some of the old favs - including this one!

title: Die Hard
text: My husband considers this a christmas movie.  Eh... not me so much.  But it is action packed and a great young bruce willis project.  Foreign terrorists take over a building.  Wife is very successful - marriage on the rock with bruce willis - he wants to reconcile.. she is less convinced - until he shows his hero badge.  It's a fun action packed movie.  No nudity or sex, but lots of language - in case you're considering ages.  We purchase all our movies via stream any more - no DVD to store or break and you can download to most any device.  Win/win

title: Bobs Red Mill Organic brown rice farina
text: Bobs red mill organic brown rice farina.  One of my favorite cereals.  I prefer Bobs Red Mill brand the best. In my opinion is tastes better than cream of wheat - creamier in texture and of course tastes different than wheat because it's rice.  Easy on an upset stomach.  And delicious when you want a creamier cereal than wheat or oats. I like it sweet or savory - a little butter and cinnamon and sugar or a poached egg on top with a little salt and pepper. Having said all of this, I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful. title: full size Big Bunk Bars
text: Ooo. I LOVE Big hunk bars.  They are deeply chewy (NOT for questionable mouth gear) and little - how would say, not really salt, but peanutty - just a little with the peanuts.  Mostly it's about that chewy nougat.  MMMMMmmm  I've always loved them.  Freeze and break into pieces, or break at room temp.  For whatever reason I can't get them locally, so I have to order. title: Haas Avocados
text: Honestly, I think that Haas avocados are the very best - taste and creamy texture.  The best flesh in my opinion.  Best when on sale, of course!

title: conventally grown limes
text: The limes were great... fresh, firm and delicious.  I don't purchase organic citrus - because you generally don't eat the skins and they are thick enough.  I save organic purchases for things like apples, berries, potatoes, and other items you eat the skins of - just my personal opinion!

title: Flaky finishing sea salt
text: This is a beautiful, flaky finishing sea salt.  Comes in a plastic jar with screw on lid.  (Do wish it was glass and may re-jar it).  The flakes are fairly large - meant to be a finishing salt, but could be cooked.  Having said all of this, I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful. title: micro memory card for samsung phones
text: This memory card is a must have if you have a Samsung galaxy that takes a memory card, like an S10+.  If you have a new S22 ultra, they do not take a memory card.  So you'll want to make sure your card takes an additional backup memory card AND the right size.  This one is a 'micro' size. title: ear bud covers
text: Don't work with the Samsung earbud pros... so they are junk to me... gotta pay better attention to the details when purchasing (hubby - GRRR).  They are a nice selection of moldable foam tips if you have something they will fit on.
product_title: JLab Cloud Foam Mnemonic Earbud Tips | 4 Pairs of Custom Fit Universal Tips | Memory Cloud Foam | Black/Blue

title: husband says excellent
text: Husband purchased these as a gift for a teacher who is sharing his skills at bird watching with young kids.  Husband reports they work wonderfully and were greatly appreciated.
product_title: Nikon 7245 Action 10x50 EX Extreme All-Terrain Binocular

title: So far, so good
text: I've had this computer for a few weeks now.  It's been great.  Fast and easy.  The BEST part?? Windows 7.  Yup.  I HATE 8.  Won't have it. I am a mouse user, hate the touch pad.  One the greatest things about this computer is that you can EASILY turn the touch pad on and off with a double tap in the right spot. Perfect.  Honestly, I'm very happy with this notebook that DOES NOT have windows 8.  :)
product_title: HP 4540s i5-3210M 16-Inch Notebook (500 GB, 4 GB SO-DIMM DDR3 Windows 7, Intel HD Graphics 4000)
